abstract: Russian officials respond to reports that United States may increase military presence in bordering NATO states, saying move undermines 1997 agreement and could lead to competitive arms buildup in area.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Ministry warned of “dangerous consequences” if the Americans station tanks and other heavy battle equipment to NATO states near Russia.

headline.main: Russia Urges U.S. Not to Deploy Weapons to Border Areas

snippet: The Foreign Ministry warned of “dangerous consequences” if the Americans station tanks and other heavy battle equipment to NATO states near Russia.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
